knimeNode.name: Random Forest Distance
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a distance measure based on the proximity induced by the given random forest model.

fullDescription.intro:
Creates a distance measure based on the proximity induced by the given random forest* model.
The proximity of two rows is the number of trees in which the two rows end up in the same leaf divided by the total number of trees.
(*) RANDOM FOREST is a registered trademark of Minitab, LLC and is used with Minitabâ€™s permission.

ports.outPort: The distance measure induced by the random forest model that is provided in the inport.
